name: Snooze Todoist tasks until 3 days before due date
description:
Use case
This workflow snoozes any Todoist tasks, by moving them into a Snoozed todoist list and unsnoozes them 3 days before due date. Helps keep inbox clear only of tasks you need to worry about soon.

How to setup
Add your Todoist creds
Create a Todoist project called snoozed
Set the project ids in the relevant nodes
Add due dates to your tasks in Inbox. Watch them disappear to snoozed. Set their date to tomorrow, watch it return to inbox.

How to adjust this template
Adjust the timeline.. Maybe 3 days is too close for you. Works mostly for me :)
